title: First-Language Enhancement Program for Special Education Learners in Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Program addressing language development delays in learners with mild developmental disabilities (intellectual disabilities, ADHD). Supports immersive learning through virtual world simulations rather than physical classroom applications.

learning_goals: Learners can construct basic sentence structures with over 80% accuracy using daily conversation scenarios presented in virtual learning environments.
Learners can correctly use over 10 key vocabulary words contextually in mobile-based 3D virtual spaces.
Through weekly microlearning assignments, learners can communicate using expressions practiced at least three times with parents at home.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
